title: Help?
body: so what happens when you get gold on nov 8th? my friend wants to know he wants the rewards but its almost 12.

replies.body:
A bit late to predict, but Gold Rewards are the gold loading screen border, summoner Icon, banner trim, social flares (for invites/requests), and Victorious Maokai (+Maokai if not owned). You can see the other Ranked Tier rewards for 2016 [here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon)

Let me know if you have any questions.
